summary:
Dr. (Lt Gen) CS Narayanan completed his DM (Neurology) at AIIMS in 1998, He gained rich experience in leading Clinical Services, Teaching and Research in Neurology for 20 years at the largest tertiary care centres of the Armed Forces. He rose to the rank of Lt Gen, the highest that can be tenanted by a medical professional in the Armed Forces and tenanted the appointment of Dy Chief Integrated Defence Staff. As Maj Gen, Heheld two key appointments - Dy Commandant and Dean (Academics) at Army Hospital (Research and Referral), which is the apex super-speciality hospital of the Armed Forces, and that of Senior Consultant (Medicine), responsible for overseeing the professional care of all specialists and super-specialists in the Armed Forces Medical Services (AFMS).

During his long stint at Army Hospital (R&R), He have been part of the team which put in place several robust neurology sub-speciality programs, including acute stroke care services, epilepsy surgery, and advanced immuno-modulatory therapies for multiple sclerosis. He have vast experience in administration of botulinum toxin for various Movement Disorders. He was part of the team that performed the first deep brain stimulation procedure in the Armed Forces in 2000. As Professor of Neurology in the largest tertiary care centres of the Armed Forces, He have been a teacher, research guide and examiner for MD (Medicine) and DNB (Neurology) students for over 15 years in various universities.

- Unique distinction of being awarded the Vishisht Sewa Medal for distinguished service by the Honâ€™ble President of India three times (2009, 2014, and 2015)

- Appointed as Honorary Surgeon to the President of India on 25th Jul 2017

- Presented a report on the implementation of Telemedicine to soldiers in remote combat posts of the Armed Forces to Shri Pranab Kumar Mukherji, Honâ€™ble President of India on 7th April 2017

summary: Dr. Avnish Seth is Head - Medical Gastroenterology Hepatology And Manipal Organ Sharing & Transplant at Manipal Hospital. He then worked as a consultant to the Armed Forces In Gastroenterology And Hepatobiliary Sciences with a special interest in advanced GI Endoscopic procedures and treatment of liver disorders. In 2004 he was appointed as a head of the department at the prestigious army hospital (research & referral) New Delhi where he was designated Gastroenterologist to the president of India. He initiated the DNB (Gastroenterology) program in 2004. In 2006 he concluded a 6 months Fellowship in Liver Transplantation in the UK and established a successful liver transplant program at army hospital (R&R). Formerly, professor of medicine at Delhi University (2004) and Indraprastha University (2008), he has served as governing council member for Indian Society Of Gastroenterology (ISG) and Society Of GI Endoscopy Of India (SGEI). In 2007, Dr. Seth launched the Armed Forces Organ Retrieval & Transplantation Authority (AORTA). As a founding director, he spearheaded the most successful campaign on organ donation after brain death in north India which has resulted in over 70 liver transplants, 140 kidney and cornea transplants and 3 heart transplants. He was a member of the government of India, ministry of health & family welfare committee on the formulation of national guidelines for liver transplantation in 2007. He was awarded the Vishisht Sewa medal for meritorious service by the president of India on 26 January 2009. Dr. Seth took premature retirement from armed forces medical services in 2009. He then headed the department of Gastroenterology and Liver Diseases at BLK Superspeciality Hospital from 2009-11. He completed a Fellowship in Endoscopic Ultrasound from the Medical University Of South Carolina And University Of Alabama Birmingham, the USA in 2011. He also joined Fortis Group Of Hospitals in 2012. Dr. Seth has a special interest in advance GI endoscopic procedures and has over 100 publications to his name.

While assessing patient Dr. Gourav Gupta takes into account not only psychological problems but also physical problems faced by the patient. Accordingly he advice patient psychotherapy, relaxation exercise, medications and any change required at home/office setting.

summary:
Dr. Amit Garg has been serving the cause of mental illness and mental health for over twelve  years now. He had trained for his undergraduate education from University college of Medical Sciences , and Guru Teg Bahadur Hospital, Delhi which is a renowned medical college situated in the state of Delhi. 
In the nascent stage of his medical education he developed a keen interest and empathy for the suffering caused by mental illness. Thereafter he cleared his post graduation examination with flying colours ans joined the prestigious Maulana Azad Medical College, and Gobind Ballabh Bhai Pant Institute of medical education and research for training into Psychiatry and mental health. He imbibed the essential ingredients of being a caring and efficient Psychiatrist and professional. Later on he went on to do Senior Residency and was chosen to be in an academic and teaching position as an Assistant Professor of Psychiatry at Institute of Human Behaviour and Allied Sciences (IHBAS) which is a tertiary care autonomous organization working with the problems of Brain and Mind.

He was able to earn many laurels during his career as a Psychiatrist and mental health professional including being awarded the Ravi Pandey memorial award for the best young Psychiatrist by the Delhi Psychiatric Society.

He possesses a never ending zeal and dedication towards healing the problems related to brain and mind. He has often been described as a calm, dedicated, and warm clinician by patients, peers and superiors working with him. He is always available ans accessible to his patients and their needs of care and support. His ability to listen and communicate clearly and efficiently has been commendable ans praise worthy. He is always respectful to the needs of patients and family members including their emotional distress and confidentiality. 
Most importantly he is genuinely interested in the well being and best interest of the patients and family members. 
He practices with a Bio-Psycho-social model which is the backbone or the gold standard of Mental health care in the twenty first century. His modern outlook towards the field of Psychiatry propelled him to remain updated about the developments in his area of practice. 

He wishes to continue his humble endeavor towards healing the problems of Brain and Mind with an overall goal towards mental health well being for all.

qualifications.college: IHBAS (Institute of Human Behaviour and Allied Sciences), Delhi University

summary:
Dr. Paramjeet Singh is a Psychiatrist with over 14 years of clinical, teaching and research experience. A graduate from the renowned Maulana Azad Medical College, Lok Nayak Hospital and Gobind Ballabh Bhai Pant Institute of medical education and research, He was deeply affected by the psychological and emotional distress of patients suffering from various medical and surgical illnesses. This motivated him to choose Psychiatry as his subject of interest in providing health care to the society at large. His post-graduate training at the much sought after premier neuropsychiatric hospital;  IHBAS (Institute Of Human Behavior & Allied Sciences) provided him with a vast knowledge of severe mental illness like schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, and substance addiction. Chronic and disabling neurotic disorders like depression and anxiety along with neuropsychiatric disorders of dementia and parkinsonism are his area of expertise. 
Having organized multiple mental health camps on world mental health day each year has ingrained him with a strong skill of establishing rapport and instilling confidence in personal interactions even with the most difficult patients. Teaching post graduate medical students, nursing cadets and psychology interns, the fine nuances of psychiatry for over 12 years, make him an expert in his field. An excellent example of a harmonious blend of traditional and contemporary outlook, his methods of practicing Psychiatry reflect his warm, genuine and empathic personality along with a firm yet polite approach towards his patients.

Widely acknowledged by his students, colleagues, and seniors as a patient, dedicated and learned clinician, he is respected and much sought after by his patients for his calm, approachable and flexible approach towards management of mental illness. Having claimed many laurels and awards for his expertise in this field, he wishes to dedicate more of himself in the field of mental health care in the coming years. With the long-term goal of reducing distress caused by mental illness not just in the patient or caregiver, but society at large, he has initiated investing greater energies and interests by extending his participation and availability for his patients and wishes to continue with these humble efforts to further this cause.

has also been actively involved in furthering the cause of mental health care. His passion towards psychiatry and mental health is the driving force for him to be actively involved in patients welfare.

summary:
Dr. Ajay Ajmani is an experienced Delhi-based Diabetologist and Endocrinologist with more than threeâ€‹ decades of experience behind him. Besides an MBBS, he has procured an MD in General Medicine and the superspeciality DM degree in Endocrinology. He is available for consultations at the BLK Superspeciality Hospital, where he has been since 2010, designated as Consultant and Head of the Department of Endocrinology. He can also be met at the Diabetes, Thyroid and Endocrine Clinic, which is located in Ajay Enclave (near Subash Nagar Metro station, Pacificâ€‹ Mallâ€‹)

Following his post-graduation, Dr. Ajmani took up residency at the Lok Nayak Jai Prakash Narayan Hospital in New Delhi until September 1987, after which he was posted as a Medical Officer in the Delhi Administration Service up to June 1993. As he pursued his DM, he was stationed at the Post Graduate Institute of Medical Research in Chandigarh. He returned to serve the Delhi Administration, this time as a Medical Specialist from June 1993 to March 1995. Subsequently, for the next four years, he was also involved in training at the Lady Hardinge Medical College in New Delhi, before he moved to the Dr. RML Hospital where he held the positions of Endocrinologist and Senior Endocrinologist/Head of the Endocrine Unit until January 2010. He is recognizedâ€‹â€‹â€‹ as a teacher at Delhi University (Faculty of Medicine) and at IP University (Faculty of Endocrinology).

Dr. Ajay Ajmani has been keenly entrenched into research dealing with thyroid, pituitary tumours and diabetes, having conducted several related studies and clinical trials. He has contributed to a large number of peer-reviewed journals and books, with articles, papers, abstracts and chapters, many of which have also been presented at conferences over the years. He regularly attends conferences, seminars and workshops on diabetes and endocrine disorders and has also participated as speaker and chairperson at various meets. Further, he has been involved as a member of the selection committee for recruiting doctors for posts in medicine and endocrinology in government Institutions. In addition, Dr. Ajmani has also been on the panel for various government projects and institutions for issues relating to diabetes and endocrine disorders. He is a member of several professional associations and bodies.

Areas of Expertise:
Addiction Psychiatry: Dr. Sanjana Mathur specializes in the treatment of substance use disorders, helping patients overcome dependencies on alcohol, drugs, and other addictive behaviors. Her approach includes a combination of medication management, psychotherapy, and personalized care plans tailored to each patient's needs.
Consultation-Liaison Psychiatry: She excels in the field of consultation-liaison psychiatry, working at the intersection of physical and mental health. General Psychiatry: Dr. Sanjana Mathur is proficient in managing a broad range of psychiatric disorders, including depression, anxiety, bipolar disorder, and schizophrenia. Her treatment philosophy is grounded in evidence-based practices, with a focus on both pharmacological and psychotherapeutic interventions.
Professional Approach:
Dr.Sanjana  Mathur's practice is characterized by her patient-centric approach and dedication to providing high-quality care. She believes in building strong therapeutic relationships with her patients, fostering an environment of trust and open communication. Throughout her career, Dr. Sanjana Mathur has been dedicated to advancing the field of psychiatry through continuous learning and professional development. She stays updated with the latest research and developments in mental health care, ensuring that her patients benefit from the most current and effective treatment modalities. Dr. Mathur is also actively involved in educating her patients and their families about mental health conditions, promoting awareness and reducing stigma.

Personal Philosophy:
Dr.Sanjana Mathur's personal philosophy revolves around the belief that mental health is integral to overall health. She strives to empower her patients by helping them understand their conditions and actively participate in their treatment. Her compassionate and holistic approach ensures that patients receive comprehensive care that addresses their physical, emotional, and psychological needs.

Dr. Sanjana Mathur's blend of extensive training, specialized expertise, and compassionate patient care makes her a valuable asset to the Noida community and the field of psychiatry. Dr Priyanka Pal Mantri has done her specialization in Dermatology and Aesthetic Medicine. She completed her MBBS from Maulana Azad Medical College,  New Delhi securing distinction followed by her internship from the associated Lok Nayak Hospital, G.B. Pant Hospital & Guru Nanak Eye Center (Delhi University), New Delhi.  She passed her MD in Dermatology  from the same college in the year 2006.

Professional Experience

Dr Priyanka Pal Mantri is a renowned Dermatologist and Cosmetologist with over 12 years of clinical experience including MD. She is working as visiting consultant Dermatology, Lasers & Aesthetic Medicine in Max Super Speciality Hospital, Saket, New Delhi for over 7 years and has recently also joined Max Hospital, Gurgaon. She is also working as Consultant  with Columbia Asia Hospital, Palam Vihar,  Gurgaon for over 7 years. She has in the past worked as chief coordinator at Max Aesthetic Laser Centre, Max Medcentre, Panchsheel Park, New Delhi. She has also acquired  extensive experience in all kinds of childhood skin problems by working as a Senior Registrar in the Department of Paediatric Dermatology at Chacha Nehru Bal Chikitsalay (a paediatric superspeciality hospital affiliated to Maulana Azad Medical College , New Delhi) in the past.

Dr Priyanka Pal Mantri is highly proficient in all kinds of dermatosurgical procedures such as radiofrequency, electrocautery, cryotherapy, nail surgeries, vitiligo surgeries and excisions. She is also well versed in the use of  botox (botulinum toxin), fillers (Restylene, Juvederm etc.) and chemical peels for facial rejuvenation and other antiaging treatments. She has  good experience in the use of various Lasers and light devices including those for hair removal, scars and pigmentation. She possesses great expertise in using latest & advanced desensitising immunotherapies for various autoimmune disorders and allergies. She is professionally associated with Indian Association of Dermatologists, Venereologists & Leprologists (IADVL) as a life member.

Awards and Publications

Dr Priyanka Pal Mantri was awarded with the prestigious Meghna Baweja award for the best all round performance during her  MBBS. She is also the winner of Junior Science Talent Search (JSTS) & National Science Talent Search (NSTS) scholarships and Maths Olympiad during schooling at Delhi Public School, R. K. Puram, New Delhi. The research works done by her are myriad and there are innumerable conferences to her credit.

Dr. Hitesh Garg has extensive experience in spine surgery having trained from the spine centers of the world and India. Dr. Garg specializes in the comprehensive treatment of numerous conditions affecting the cervical, thoracic, and lumbosacral spine including degenerative disc disease, scoliosis, trauma, infections, and tumors. He has performed more than 2000 spine surgeries including more than 1500 spinal fusions, 250 deformity correction procedures (Scoliosis and kyphosis), 150 lumbar and cervical artificial disc replacements. 

In spite of being offered a faculty position in USA, he chose to come back to India with the aim of establishing an Advanced Spine Center of international repute in India. With the same aim in mind, in 2010, he started the Spine Surgery Department at Artemis Health Institute, one of the Leading Multispecialty hospital in Gurgaon,  with the unique concept of neurosurgeons and orthopedic surgeons working together to give the results. 

Dr. Garg believes in meeting patients' individual needs through comprehensive evaluation and treatment designed to help them achieve active, pain-free lifestyles. He combines leading edge techniques with proven traditional methods to provide patients with the care possible. 

Dr Hitesh Garg has strong academic interests. He has written chapters in world renowned books on Spine Surgery and has several publications nationally and internationally. He received the Dr. Pandurangi Award for the â€œOrthopaedic Residentâ€ for the year 2006-07 at KEM Hospital and Seth G S Medical College, Mumbai. He was also selected among the top 12 nominees out of 298 submissions for All Asia Young Inventor Award organized by Hewlett Packard (Dec 2000), for work on Homemade spacer for asthmatic patients. The work was mentioned in â€œFar Eastern Economic Reviewâ€ (Dec, 2000).

Dr. Sandeep Chauhan is a board certified orthopedic surgeon specializing in hip and knee joint
replacement surgery, complex fractures reconstructions and musculoskeletal infections. Dr. Sandeep
Chauhan completed his medical training from Kolhapur graduating from Shivaji University in 1995. He
completed his surgical training at the P.G.I.M.S. Rohtak and Deen Dayal Upadhyay Hospital New Delhi.
He acquired Joint Replacement fellowship training under Dr. Brig B.K.Singh at Army Hospital R&R New
Delhi, and the legendary Dr. C.S. Ranawat at Hospital for special surgery New York. He is a visiting
clinician at Mt. Sinai Hospital Toronto and Mayo Clinic Rochester Mn. U.S.A.
His advanced training in plastic surgery helps him to evaluate and provide the best course of care for his
patients having soft tissue injuries better than his fellow colleagues. Dr. Chauhan enjoys his role as a
surgeon, educator, researcher, and is dedicated to provide the best surgical and nonsurgical treatment
option for each patient's unique needs and individual goals . Clinical outcomes and comfortable
rehabilitation has been his primary focus.
He is an expert in merging old and new technologies, including Platelet rich plasma injections, varied
approaches i.e. MIS, subvastus and alternative bearings for younger patients: ceramic, metal, and
plastic, where they are indicated, revision total hip and total knee replacement and peri-prosthetic 
fractures. He also has specialized training in computer assisted joint replacement surgeries and is among
the few surgeons in India who have the experience of doing Robotic joint replacement.
Dr. Chauhan's primary research interests include preventing and tackling infections in joint
replacements, Fixation of Calcaneal fractures and fractures in Osteoporotic Patients.
Dr. Sandeep Chauhan has a dedicated orthopedic practice at Maitri Medicare and Artemis hospital. Dr.
Chauhan and his trained staff are committed to delivering the highest level of professional care possible
to patients with the goal to provide quality Orthopaedic care with a personal touch.
Dr. Sandeep and his expert team can help you find the best treatment options if you are suffering from
any of these knee problems:
â€¢ Knee injuries and disorders
â€¢ Anterior cruciate ligament (ACL) injuries
â€¢ Meniscal tears
â€¢ Sports injuries and overuse syndromes
â€¢ Patellar dislocations and disorders
â€¢ Fractures
â€¢ Cartilage injuries
â€¢ Wear and osteolysis
If you are suffering from hip conditions, Dr. Sandeep Chauhan and team can help you find the best
treatment option:
â€¢ Complications of total hip replacement
â€¢ Overuse syndromes
â€¢ Labral tears
â€¢ Hip dysplasia
â€¢ Femoro-acetabular impingment
â€¢ Wear and osteolysis
â€¢ Hip dislocations
â€¢ Peri-prosthetic fractures and infections
Commonly performed joint replacement surgeries & procedures include:
â€¢ Total Knee Replacement or TKR
â€¢ Partial Knee Replacement
â€¢ Total Hip Replacement
â€¢ Minimally invasive surgeries such as partial knee resurfacing, arthroscopy of the knee etc
Should your condition mandates that a partial or total joint replacement surgery is the right option for
you, Dr. Chauhan will discuss various type of procedures available to you with focus on better outcomes
and in some cases faster recovery times. Though Dr. Sandeep Chauhan remains at the forefront of the
latest technological advances in joint replacement surgeries, he never loses sight of the importance of
optimizing patient outcomes and implant longevity above all else.
Entire team at Maitri Medicare recognizes the trust patients place in their doctor and staff when they decide to undergo joint replacement surgery. It is this trust that drives Dr. Chauhan and his team offer
surgical excellence which not only meets but exceeds patientsâ€™ expectations. You are welcome to
explore this website to know more about facilities or get quality health information. You can ask health
questions, consult online or enquire about approximate cost of total knee replacement or hip
replacement surgery, read patient testimonials, give feedback or book an appointment with Dr. Sandeep Chauhan.

summary:
Dr. Itisha Chaudhary is a distinguished Surgical Oncologist currently practising at Manipal Hospital, Gurugram, bringing with her a wealth of academic excellence and surgical expertise. Her medical training includes qualifications from some of Indiaâ€™s most prestigious institutes such as Maulana Azad Medical College (Delhi) and AIIMS Bhubaneswar, where she completed her M.Ch. in Surgical Oncology.

Dr. Chaudhary is extensively trained in Minimally Invasive, Laparoscopic, and Robotic Cancer Surgeries, holding fellowships from IAGES and the Fellowship of Association of Robotic and Innovative Surgeons (FARIS), affiliated with the Royal College of Surgeons, Edinburgh. She is among the first to complete Indiaâ€™s university-affiliated global programme in robotic surgery.

At Manipal Hospital Gurugram, Dr. Itisha Chaudhary focuses on the surgical management of gastrointestinal and thoracic malignancies, delivering personalised and technologically advanced treatment plans. Her clinical approach integrates precision, compassion, and cutting-edge techniques to offer the best outcomes for patients with complex cancers.

Dr. Chaudhary has contributed significantly to cancer research, with multiple national and international publications to her name. Her work in oral, lung, and gastric cancers is widely cited and recognised in global oncological forums. She has presented her findings at conferences hosted by the European Society of Surgical Oncology, Foundation of Head and Neck Oncology, and other reputed bodies, earning accolades for best paper and poster presentations.

She recently enhanced her global surgical exposure by completing a hands-on workshop in Minimally Invasive Gastrectomy and Esophagectomy at Utrecht Medical Center, Netherlands, under the mentorship of Prof. Richard van Hillegersberg.

In addition to her clinical practice, Dr. Itisha Chaudhary is passionate about community outreach and has actively participated in cancer screening camps and public awareness initiatives across Delhi-NCR.

Patients searching for an expert lady cancer surgeon in Gurugram or looking for advanced robotic cancer surgery in Gurgaon can consult Dr. Itisha Chaudhary at Manipal Hospital Gurugram, where she offers compassionate, evidence-based oncological care.

By staying abreast of the latest advancements in the field, Dr. Dheeraj Kapoor ensures that his patients receive the most up-to-date and evidence-based care.
